title: 30 Days to Overcome Toxic Thinking: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Renew Your Mind and Find Peace
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are You Ready to Break Free from Negativity and Transform Your Mind in Just 30 Days?

Your thoughts shape your reality—and toxic thinking can keep you trapped in cycles of fear, doubt, and frustration. 30 Days to Overcome Toxic Thinking: Renew Your Mind and Find Peace is your ultimate guide to breaking free from negativity and stepping into a life filled with clarity, confidence, and purpose.

This is More Than a Book—It’s a 30-Day Transformation:

  • Renew Your Mind: Learn how to replace toxic thoughts with empowering truths.

  • Break Free from Negativity: Identify harmful patterns and unlock the peace you’ve been longing for.

  • Find Inner Peace: Experience mental clarity and emotional healing as you align your thoughts with positivity and purpose.

  • Transform Your Thoughts: Discover practical steps, powerful prayers, and proven strategies to change your mindset.

What Will You Experience in 30 Days?

  • A renewed perspective filled with hope and optimism.

  • Freedom from limiting beliefs and negative self-talk.

  • Lasting inner peace and spiritual growth.

  • The confidence to live boldly in alignment with your God-given purpose.

Why This Book?
This proven step-by-step guide combines practical tools with spiritual insights to help you overcome toxic thinking, no matter where you are in life. With inspiring testimonies, daily action steps, and life-changing affirmations, you’ll see results in just 30 days.

Your Journey to Peace Starts Now.

Why wait another day to find the peace and clarity you’ve been longing for? Take the first step today. This book is not just a guide—it’s your breakthrough.

Your Mind is the Key to Your Future. Unlock it in 30 days.

title: 30 Days to Overcome Self-Doubt: Your Step-by-Step Guide to Boldness and Confidence
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Overcome Self-Doubt in Just 30 Days and Step Into Boldness and Confidence!

Are you tired of feeling stuck, second-guessing yourself, or letting fear hold you back? Do you long to break free from the voice of doubt that whispers, "You're not enough"? It’s time to silence that voice, rediscover your true potential, and embrace the bold, confident life you were meant to live.

In 30 Days to Overcome Self-Doubt: A Step-by-Step Guide to Boldness and Confidence, you’ll embark on a powerful journey of transformation. This proven 30-day solution combines practical strategies, real-life testimonies, and spiritual insights to help you:

  • Identify and eliminate the root causes of self-doubt.

  • Replace fear and hesitation with unwavering courage.

  • Develop daily habits that build lasting confidence.

  • Take bold steps toward your dreams and purpose.

  • Walk in your God-given identity with peace and assurance.

What Will You Feel After 30 Days?
Freedom. Boldness. Joy. Confidence. Imagine waking up each day empowered to take on life’s challenges, fully aware of your worth, and unshaken by fear or doubt. This book doesn’t just promise a solution—it guarantees a transformation.

Inside You’ll Find:

  • Step-by-step action plans for each day.

  • Inspiring testimonies from individuals across the globe.

  • Powerful affirmations, prayers, and declarations to renew your mind and spirit.

  • Real-life applications to help you conquer self-doubt in every area of life.

Whether you’ve struggled with self-doubt for years or just need a confidence boost, this book is your roadmap to freedom. By the end of these 30 days, you’ll not only overcome self-doubt—you’ll unlock a life of boldness, faith, and limitless possibilities.

Don’t let self-doubt hold you back another day. Your breakthrough begins now.

Take the first step to a bolder, more confident YOU. Buy this book and transform your life in just 30 days!

title: 30 Days To Overcome Bitterness: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Joy And Contentment

description:

  • Powerful Insights: Learn how bitterness affects your life and relationships, and how to overcome it by cultivating forgiveness, setting healthy boundaries, and walking in love. Every page will inspire you to take actionable steps toward healing and inner peace.

  • Real-Life Stories: Read powerful testimonies from readers around the world who have found healing, restoration, and joy through this journey. These inspiring stories show the true power of forgiveness and the freedom found when you let go of past hurts.

What Readers Are Saying:

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “This book truly transformed my life! After years of struggling with bitterness, I feel free. The practical steps and affirmations gave me the strength to forgive and move forward.” – Maria, USA

title: 30 Days To Overcome Prayerlessness: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Developing a Powerful Prayer Life
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
“30 Days to Overcome Prayerlessness: Developing a Powerful Prayer Life”

Are you struggling to find peace in your life? Do you feel overwhelmed, disconnected from God, and unsure how to start praying again? You’re not alone.

The demands of life can leave you feeling stressed, drained, and spiritually dry, making it hard to even begin praying. Perhaps you’ve tried before and found yourself discouraged by silence or distracted thoughts. The weight of feeling stuck can be frustrating and hopeless. But what if you could reignite your connection with God and experience the peace, clarity, and joy that comes from a vibrant prayer life?

This book is the solution you’ve been searching for.

In just 30 days, you will learn how to:

  • Break free from the habit of prayerlessness and rediscover the power of prayer.

  • Build a consistent, meaningful prayer routine that fits seamlessly into your life.

  • Experience emotional healing as you strengthen your connection with God.

  • Cultivate confidence in your prayer life, moving from frustration to a deep, transformative peace.

Using a step-by-step approach, this book offers practical strategies combined with profound spiritual wisdom, providing you with all the tools you need to turn your prayer life around. You will not only develop the habit of praying consistently, but you will also begin to experience the power of answered prayers and spiritual breakthroughs that you’ve longed for.

This book is for you if you:

  • Feel disconnected from God and struggle with consistent prayer.

  • Want to experience peace, clarity, and spiritual breakthrough.

  • Are ready to turn your frustration into powerful connection and confidence in prayer.

  • Desire a real relationship with God that impacts every area of your life.

The peace you’ve been longing for is just 30 days away—are you ready to embrace it? Take the first step today towards a transformed prayer life and a new level of spiritual freedom.

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Spiritual Attacks: Your Step-By-Step Guide to Everlasting Peace and Happiness

  • Stand boldly in your faith, ready to face every challenge with victory.

  • Experience the fullness of God's promises for your life—fearless, joyful, and free.

Whether you’ve been overwhelmed by fear for years or are seeking fresh strength to face new challenges, this book is your ultimate weapon against spiritual attacks. With powerful real-life testimonies, action steps, and prayers that work, this is not just a book—it’s a transformational experience.

Your journey to everlasting peace and happiness starts today.

Pick up your copy now, and take the first fearless step toward the life God has called you to live.

Don’t let fear have the final say. With this book, victory is yours.

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Bad Luck: Your Step-by-Step Guide to Attracting Favor and Blessings
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are you ready to break free from the cycle of bad luck and step into a life filled with favor, opportunities, and blessings?

For too long, you’ve felt like success is just out of reach. Every effort you make to move forward feels like it’s met with failure or setback. But what if everything you’ve been experiencing isn’t bad luck—it’s the result of unseen forces that you have the power to overcome?

In 30 Days to Overcome Bad Luck, you will unlock the keys to break free from the grip of misfortune and attract divine favor like never before. This isn’t just a self-help book—it’s a transformative journey. Each day, you’ll learn a powerful step-by-step strategy to shift your mindset, overcome the forces that have held you back, and position yourself for real breakthroughs.

Here’s what you’ll gain in just 30 days:

  • Clarity and confidence to recognize and break free from cycles of bad luck and misfortune.

  • Practical, easy-to-follow steps to activate divine favor and shift your circumstances from lack to abundance.

  • Proven techniques to open doors of opportunity that lead to prosperity and success.

  • Transformative daily actions that will help you embrace abundance, peace, and joy in every area of your life.

30 Days to Overcome Bad Luck will guide you through the process of personal transformation and equip you with the spiritual tools to create the success and abundance you deserve. With this guide, you will learn to walk by faith and claim the favor and blessings that are waiting for you.

The life of blessings you’ve been waiting for is closer than you think. Don’t let bad luck define you anymore. This is your moment to rise up and step into a future filled with prosperity, opportunities, and success.

Are you ready to leave behind bad luck and step into the future of favor? Get your copy today, and begin your transformation now. The doors to your destiny are waiting to be opened.

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Success: Your Step-by-Step Guide to Embracing Divine Promotion and Responsibility
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
"Are you ready to break free from fear and step boldly into a life of courage, clarity, and confidence?"

Change is inevitable, but fear doesn’t have to control you. Too often, the fear of change keeps people trapped in cycles of doubt, confusion, and procrastination. If you’ve ever felt stuck, overwhelmed, or afraid to take the next step, then this is your wake-up call.

"30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Change: A Step-by-Step Guide to Embracing Growth and Breakthrough" is not just another self-help book — it’s a 30-day transformation challenge. Over the next 30 days, you will confront your deepest fears, gain the clarity you’ve been praying for, and activate the courage to move forward with confidence.

This book is for you if:
✅ You’re tired of feeling "stuck" and ready to take action.
✅ You’re facing a major life transition and don’t know where to start.
✅ You’ve felt the pull to grow, but fear keeps holding you back.

Through daily teachings, practical exercises, and powerful prophetic declarations, you’ll be guided step-by-step on how to overcome the fear of change and step into personal growth, divine alignment, and supernatural breakthrough.This book equips you with everything you need to face change with boldness, clarity, and purpose.

Here’s What You’ll Discover in This Book:

  • How to recognize the signs of divine alignment so you can seize God-given opportunities.

  • How to overcome fear, doubt, and self-sabotage so you can move forward with courage.

  • How to shift your mindset from confusion to clarity with daily prophetic declarations and affirmations.

  • How to break free from fear-based decision-making and step into a new season of bold faith.

  • How to use the "30-Day Transformation Challenge" to create lasting change in your life.

This isn’t just a book you read — it’s a breakthrough experience. Each chapter is packed with practical steps, journaling prompts, and action challenges that keep you moving forward every single day.

By the end of this journey, you will have:
✨ Clarity on your purpose and next steps.
✨ Confidence to face change without hesitation.
✨ Courage to embrace new seasons, divine alignment, and breakthrough opportunities.

You have the power to break free from fear — and it all starts here. Take the challenge, and in 30 days, you’ll walk away stronger, bolder, and fully aligned with your God-given purpose.

The change you’ve been praying for is here. Will you answer the call?

Take action now. Break free from fear. Walk boldly into your next season.

“30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Change: A Step-by-Step Guide to Embracing Growth and Breakthrough” — Your journey to courage, clarity, and confidence starts today.

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of The Unknown: Your Step-by-Step Practical Guide to Courage, Clarity, and Confidence
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Transform Your Life in 30 Days: A Faith-Based Journey to Overcoming Fear and Achieving Success

What’s holding you back from living the life you were meant to live? Whether it’s fear, self-doubt, or uncertainty, this 30-day challenge is your step-by-step guide to unlocking your true potential.

Packed with practical strategies, biblical insights, and inspiring real-life stories, this book will help you:

  • Embrace personal development through faith and perseverance.

  • Overcome fear and build the courage to start.

  • Develop an unstoppable entrepreneur mindset for your goals.

  • Discover the power of trusting God to lead you to your breakthrough.

  • Achieve faith-based success in every area of life.

No matter where you are in your journey—launching a dream, navigating challenges, or seeking clarity—this book is designed to guide you toward growth, fulfillment, and victory.

Don’t let fear or procrastination keep you stuck. Take action today and step into the abundant life waiting for you!

Perfect for readers who value personal growth, spiritual wisdom, and practical tools for achieving success.

Your transformation starts now. Click ‘Buy Now’ and start your 30-day journey today!

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Lack Of Purpose: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Clarity And Divine Alignment
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are you feeling stuck, directionless, or unsure about your life’s purpose? It’s time to break free from confusion and step into clarity, confidence, and divine alignment.

In just 30 days, this transformational self-discovery workbook will guide you through the process of finding your life's purpose and unlocking your potential. With powerful daily teachings, action steps, and reflective journal prompts, you’ll learn how to overcome self-doubt, develop clarity and focus, and embrace a purpose-driven life.

This isn’t just another personal growth book—it’s a Christian self-help guide rooted in faith, prayer, and biblical principles. Every chapter includes real-life testimonies, powerful declarations, and practical exercises to help you gain insight into your unique calling.

Inside this 30-day journey, you will:
✅ Find Your Purpose with clear, step-by-step guidance.
✅ Overcome Self-Doubt and walk in boldness and confidence.
✅ Master the art of Clarity and Focus, allowing you to take decisive action.
✅ Use powerful daily prayers and Christian self-help principles to align with God's divine plan for your life.
✅ Build momentum with daily exercises and reflective journal prompts that promote personal growth and development.

Each day is structured with a focused theme that walks you through self-discovery, goal-setting, and overcoming internal obstacles. This isn't a passive read—it's a journey that will push you to take action daily. You'll move from uncertainty to clarity, from doubt to confidence, and from confusion to a purpose-driven life.

If you've been searching for the tools to overcome self-doubt, live with clarity, and experience true alignment with God’s purpose for your life, this book is for you. Let this 30-day guide be your companion on the journey to living the purpose-driven life you've been called to live.

Don’t wait any longer to discover your life’s purpose. Start your 30-day journey today and experience the power of clarity, focus, and divine alignment.

title: 30 Days to Overcome The Lack of Enthusiasm: Your Step-By-Step Guide to Igniting Your Passion and Embracing Abundance
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are you feeling stuck, drained, or disconnected from your passions? Do you long for a life filled with purpose, joy, and abundance, but feel weighed down by apathy and discouragement?

In 30 Days to Overcome The Lack of Enthusiasm: A Step-by-Step Guide to Igniting Passion and Embracing Abundance, you will embark on a transformative journey that empowers you to break free from the barriers of apathy and step into the vibrant, abundant life God has promised. This guide provides a step-by-step approach to help you overcome lack of enthusiasm, ignite your passion, and align your life with purpose and confidence.

With powerful teachings, practical exercises, and heartfelt testimonies, you’ll learn how to:

  • Overcome apathy and reignite your passion for a purposeful life.

  • Cultivate gratitude and trust in God’s promises, fostering spiritual growth and personal transformation.

  • Strengthen your spiritual walk, align your actions with God’s purpose, and live a life of abundance and success.

  • Embrace challenges with resilience, perseverance, and unwavering confidence in God's plan.

  • Embrace the fullness of life, living each day with joy, enthusiasm, and a positive mindset.

This book is not just about motivation—it’s a spiritual journey that equips you with the tools to transform your life and experience true freedom. Whether you're seeking spiritual growth, personal success, or simply a renewed sense of passion, this guide will help you walk boldly into the abundant life God has prepared for you.

Your breakthrough is just one page away. Start your transformation today and live a life of purpose, passion, and divine abundance!

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Rejection: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Unlock Your True Worth and Build Lasting Confidence
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Rejection: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Unlock Your True Worth and Build Lasting Confidence

Are you tired of letting the fear of rejection hold you back from pursuing your dreams, building meaningful relationships, and stepping into your full potential? The fear of rejection can paralyze us, leaving us feeling unworthy, unseen, and inadequate. But what if you could break free from the chains of fear and embrace the confidence that comes from knowing your true worth?

In 30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Rejection, you will embark on a transformative journey that will empower you to conquer fear, embrace your identity in Christ, and live boldly without the weight of rejection. Through daily affirmations, practical steps, and powerful Scriptures, this book will guide you through a process of healing and growth, helping you to replace self-doubt with unshakable confidence.

You’ll discover how to:

  • Shift your mindset from fear to faith, trusting in God’s perfect plan for your life.

  • Let go of past hurts and embrace the freedom that comes with forgiveness.

  • Build lasting confidence that is rooted in your identity as a beloved child of God.

  • Step into every opportunity with boldness and assurance, knowing that rejection no longer holds power over you.

Whether you’ve been rejected in relationships, career, or simply by the world, this book will equip you with the tools to rise above it and walk in your true calling. 30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Rejection is not just a book—it’s the key to unlocking the lasting confidence and freedom you deserve.

Are you ready to live free from rejection? Your journey to confidence starts here.

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Old Age: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Embrace Boldness, Confidence, and Faith for Your Best Years Ahead
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Old Age: Your Step-By-Step Guide to Embrace Boldness, Confidence, and Faith for Your Best Years Ahead

Do you find yourself worrying about growing older? Are you struggling with fear, uncertainty, or a sense of lost purpose as you age? Overcoming the fear of aging doesn’t have to be overwhelming. In this faith-filled and practical guide, you’ll discover how to walk boldly, confidently, and purposefully into your later years.

This 30-day personal growth plan is carefully designed to help you:

  • Confront and conquer the fear of aging with step-by-step daily lessons.

  • Embrace spiritual empowerment to live boldly, grounded in God’s promises.

  • Gain confidence and clarity about your identity and purpose in this season.

  • Rediscover joy and meaning through faith-based self-help strategies for seniors.

  • Build a legacy of wisdom, faith, and boldness that inspires future generations.

Each day offers:
✅ Powerful Scripture Reflections to strengthen your spiritual foundation.
✅ Daily Affirmations to boost your boldness and renew your mindset.
✅ Targeted Prayer Points to invite God’s power and peace into your journey.
✅ Practical Steps to implement real change and thrive in your best years.

Why This Book Works

This guide is a Christian guide to aging gracefully, combining biblical truths with actionable advice. Whether you are navigating retirement, facing physical changes, or redefining your purpose, this book will equip you to live with boldness and confidence in old age.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Break free from fear, doubt, and societal myths about aging.

  • Build resilience through faith-based personal growth for seniors.

  • Step into each day with renewed energy, joy, and purpose.


Who Should Read This Book?

If you’re ready to live fearlessly, this book is for you. Perfect for seniors, retirees, caregivers, or anyone seeking spiritual empowerment for aging, it’s a transformative tool that guarantees results within 30 days.


A Gift That Lasts a Lifetime

This book is more than a guide—it’s a lifelong resource. It’s also the perfect gift for loved ones, inspiring them to embrace their later years with faith, purpose, and joy.

Order 30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Old Age today and take the first step toward a fearless, faith-filled, and confident future. With God’s help, your best years are still ahead!

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Criticism: Your Step-by-Step Guide to Building Confidence and Living Fearlessly
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are you ready to break free from the fear that holds you back?
We all face criticism at some point, but for many, it becomes a barrier that prevents us from living fully and pursuing our dreams. If the fear of judgment, rejection, or failure has kept you from stepping into your true potential, then this book is the step-by-step solution you've been searching for.

In 30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Criticism, you will discover a powerful, actionable guide to help you:

  • Transform self-doubt into unshakable confidence

  • Embrace criticism as a tool for personal growth and success

  • Break free from the fear of judgment that holds you back from reaching your goals

  • Live boldly and authentically, no longer restricted by others’ opinions

Each of the 30 steps is designed to empower you, with daily affirmations, practical exercises, and thought-provoking prayers that guide you towards lasting change. By following these steps, you’ll gradually eliminate the fear of criticism and replace it with a fearless confidence that propels you toward your goals.

This book isn’t just a one-time read; it’s a resource you can return to whenever you need a boost of courage, a reminder of your worth, or a renewed sense of purpose.

Get ready to embrace your true potential and live fearlessly—because the life you’ve been waiting for is waiting for you to take the first step.

title: Practical Steps to Overcome the Fear of Lost Love: A 30-Day Step-By-Step Guide to Emotional Freedom and Lasting Relationships
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Overcome the Fear of Losing Love and Embrace the Freedom of True, Lasting Relationships!

Are you ready to release the fear that has been holding you back from experiencing love in its purest, most fulfilling form? In Practical Steps to Overcome the Fear of Loss of Love, Bishop Dr. Climate Wiseman provides a 30-day, step-by-step guide designed to help you break free from insecurity, fear of abandonment, and the emotional struggles that have kept you from fully embracing love.

With powerful biblical insights, prophetic affirmations, and prayer points, this book will help you:

  • Release Fear: Let go of the fear of losing love and learn to walk in peace, trust, and confidence.

  • Heal Emotional Wounds: Overcome past hurts and embrace emotional freedom.

  • Transform Relationships: Build healthy, authentic connections based on trust, mutual respect, and God’s unconditional love.

  • Walk in Confidence: Step into relationships with confidence and God’s peace, free from the burden of controlling others or fearing loss.

Through real-life scenarios, relatable stories, and proven principles, you’ll learn how to surrender control and trust God’s perfect plan for your love life. This book is a powerful tool to help you overcome fear and build the loving, lasting relationships you deserve.

Guaranteed to bring change in just 30 days, this book is your gateway to emotional freedom, healing, and transformative love.

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Poverty: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Break Free From The Chains of Financial Fear and Embrace Abundance
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Poverty: Your Step-By-Step Guide to Break Free from the Chains of Financial Fear and Embrace Abundance

Do you find yourself constantly worried about your finances, struggling to make ends meet, or wondering if true financial freedom is even possible? "30 Days to Overcome the Fear of Poverty" is your blueprint for breaking free from the fear of financial insecurity and stepping into a life of abundance and prosperity.

In just 30 days, you will:

  • Overcome the fear and limiting beliefs about money that have been holding you back

  • Develop a wealth-building mindset that attracts opportunities and growth

  • Discover actionable steps to manage your money, invest wisely, and build a secure financial future

  • Learn to trust in God’s provision and walk in faith towards your goals

This book offers more than just financial advice—it combines practical steps, empowering affirmations, and biblical wisdom to help you conquer your financial fears and create the life you’ve always dreamed of. The principles inside have been tested and proven, transforming lives and empowering individuals to move from scarcity to abundance.

Don’t wait for change—create it! If you're ready to take control of your financial destiny, this book is for you. Get your copy today and begin your 30-day journey to financial freedom!

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Failure: A Step-By-Step Guide To Your Freedom
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Break Free from Fear and Step Boldly into Your Future!
Are you tired of fear holding you back from pursuing your dreams? Do you feel trapped by the fear of failure, unable to fully embrace the life God has planned for you? Practical Steps: 30 Days on Overcoming the Fear of Failure is the solution you've been waiting for!

In this transformational 30-day guide, Dr. Climate combines powerful biblical insights, real-life scenarios, and actionable steps to help you:
✅ Rebuild unshakable confidence rooted in your identity as a child of God.
✅ Replace fear with faith and declare victory over failure.
✅ Learn how to turn setbacks into stepping stones for success.
✅ Build a bold mindset that aligns with God’s promises for your life.

Through daily prayers, affirmations, and practical exercises, this book will equip you to conquer fear and walk in freedom. By the end of these 30 days, you’ll feel empowered, courageous, and ready to embrace the future with bold faith.

What will your life look like when fear no longer controls you?
Start your journey today and unlock the victorious, fearless life God has destined for you!

title: 30 Days To Overcome The Fear Of Ill Health: A Step-By-Step Guide To Your Healing
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
What if the key to vibrant health and peace of mind has been within your reach all along? "30 Days To Overcome the Fear of Ill Health" offers you a guaranteed 30-day health solution that will help you break free from the grip of health anxiety and unlock the power of healing in your life.

In this transformative book, you will discover over 10 practical, actionable ways to administer healing to yourself—spiritually, emotionally, and physically. Each day you’ll step into a new tool or principle that will leave you feeling empowered, confident, and in control of your health. Whether you’re struggling with fear of illness, chronic health issues, or simply seeking peace in your body and mind, this step-by-step guide is the breakthrough you’ve been waiting for.

What will you feel after reading this book? Imagine waking up each morning with renewed energy, less fear, and more confidence in your body’s ability to heal. Visualize experiencing lasting peace that comes with knowing you can overcome any health challenge through faith, practical action, and divine empowerment.

This book is not just theory—it’s a practical health solution that can be applied immediately, with guaranteed results. Step into your healing journey today and feel the transformation within the next 30 days!

title: 30 Days To Develop A Spirit Of Excellence: Your Step By Step Guide To Mastering Character, Competence, and Calling in the Professional World
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
30 Days to a Spirit of Excellence: Mastering Character, Competence, and Calling in the Professional World

Are you tired of doing your best and still feeling overlooked, misunderstood, or stuck?
Do you know you were made for more—but can’t seem to break through?

In a world driven by speed, status, and shortcuts, excellence often gets buried under exhaustion. You want to stand out—but without selling out. You want to rise—but without losing yourself. You want to fulfill your calling—but without compromising your character.

This is the book that bridges the gap.

30 Days to a Spirit of Excellence is a transformational journey that will recalibrate your mindset, refine your habits, and reignite your passion to lead with integrity, perform with mastery, and walk boldly in your divine assignment.

With 30 days of daily wisdom, prophetic strategies, reflective prompts, and real-life breakthroughs, you’ll learn how to:

✅ Develop unshakable character in hostile environments
✅ Master professional competence without burnout
✅ Maintain your values while climbing higher
✅ Create influence without arrogance
✅ Recover your joy, clarity, and inner strength
✅ Rise without retaliation, compromise, or fear

This isn’t just another motivational book.
It’s a spiritual roadmap to becoming the person your purpose has been waiting for.

This book is for you if:

  • You’re a professional struggling to balance ambition with authenticity

  • You’re called to leadership but feel spiritually unprepared

  • You’re tired of mediocrity and ready to stand out with integrity

  • You want to build a legacy without losing your soul

  • You believe God has more for you—but need the blueprint to walk it out

Written with deep compassion, prophetic insight, and practical steps, 30 Days to a Spirit of Excellence will help you rise—one day, one habit, and one victory at a time.

The clarity, confidence, and calling you’ve been searching for is just 30 days away. Are you ready to embrace it?
longDescription: Discover powerful insights and practical strategies that will transform your personal and professional life. This comprehensive guide combines timeless wisdom with modern research to help you achieve lasting success and fulfillment.
authorBio: A renowned author and thought leader in personal development, bringing decades of experience in helping individuals and organizations achieve their potential.

title: 30 Days to Break the Curse of Late Marriage: Your Step By Step Guide To Unlock Your God-Ordained Relationship Season
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
You’ve waited. You’ve prayed. But nothing has changed—until now.

If you’ve ever felt like love has passed you by…
If you’ve watched others step into marriage while you silently wonder, “What’s wrong with me?”…
If your heart aches every time another year goes by and your prayers seem unanswered…

You are not alone—and this book was written for you.

30 Days to Break the Curse of Late Marriage is a powerful, step-by-step deliverance manual designed to expose and break every spiritual, emotional, and generational barrier blocking your God-ordained relationship season.

Through proven prophetic strategies, daily healing exercises, and intentional prayers, Bishop Climate Wiseman guides you through the inner transformation that attracts divine alignment.

You won’t just learn how to wait—you’ll learn how to break through.

In 30 Days, You Will:

  • Uproot invisible curses causing relationship delays

  • Heal emotional wounds that sabotage divine connections

  • Identify and reject counterfeit relationships

  • Pray strategically for your future spouse

  • Rediscover your identity and worth

  • Enter into a season of divine exposure, favor, and covenant fulfillment

This book is not about wishful thinking—it’s about warfare, wisdom, and winning in your relationship destiny.

This Book Is For You If:

  • You’ve experienced repeated heartbreak or betrayal

  • You feel overlooked or invisible despite your prayers

  • There is a history of late marriage or singleness in your family

  • You’re tired of surface solutions and are ready for spiritual depth

  • You desire to marry right, marry well, and marry on time

You’re not delayed—you’re being prepared. And this is your time.

The breakthrough you’ve been waiting for is just 30 days away.
Are you ready to embrace it?
longDescription: Discover powerful insights and practical strategies that will transform your personal and professional life. This comprehensive guide combines timeless wisdom with modern research to help you achieve lasting success and fulfillment.
authorBio: A renowned author and thought leader in personal development, bringing decades of experience in helping individuals and organizations achieve their potential.

title: 30 Days to Overcome Family Dysfunction: Healing From the Pain of Broken Roles, Toxic Patterns, and Divided Homes
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
What do you do when the people who were supposed to love you became the source of your deepest wounds?

The silence. The screaming. The secrets.
You’ve tried to hold the family together. You’ve tried to pray it away, reason it out, or just survive another day. But behind closed doors, the dysfunction keeps growing—and it’s taking a toll on your mind, your peace, and your sense of worth.

Whether you come from a broken marriage, a controlling parent, a hostile stepfamily, or a generational mess that no one wants to talk about—this book was written for you.

In just 30 days, you can begin a healing journey that will:

  • Break toxic emotional patterns passed down through generations

  • Help you set boundaries without losing your heart

  • Heal your identity from parental wounds and childhood chaos

  • Restore clarity where confusion once reigned

  • Equip you to build a peaceful home—even if others stay toxic

  • Free you from guilt, fear, and silent suffering

This book doesn’t just talk about dysfunction—it walks you out of it.

Every chapter includes real-life stories, prophetic insights, journal prompts, daily action steps, prayers, and declarations that confront deep-rooted pain with spiritual truth and practical strategies. Written with compassion and clarity, 30 Days to Overcome Family Dysfunction gives you the structure and support you need to reset your life—without pretending, suppressing, or enabling toxic behavior any longer.

This book is for you if you:

  • Grew up in a home where love was conditional, chaotic, or absent

  • Are raising children but afraid of repeating the same mistakes

  • Feel like the “black sheep” or emotional caretaker in your family

  • Struggle with guilt, anger, or people-pleasing because of family trauma

  • Want to change the future for the next generation—starting with yourself

The peace you’ve been longing for is just 30 days away. Are you ready to embrace it?
longDescription: Discover powerful insights and practical strategies that will transform your personal and professional life. This comprehensive guide combines timeless wisdom with modern research to help you achieve lasting success and fulfillment.
authorBio: A renowned author and thought leader in personal development, bringing decades of experience in helping individuals and organizations achieve their potential.

title: 30 Days to Overcome Spiritual Blockages: Break Invisible Resistance, Dismantle Demonic Roadblocks, and Release Divine Flow
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Something unseen is standing in your way—and you can feel it.

You’ve prayed. You’ve fasted. You’ve tried everything. Yet the doors won’t open, your progress is delayed, and breakthrough feels just out of reach. It’s not your imagination. You’re up against spiritual blockages—invisible barriers designed to keep you stuck.

If you’re weary of frustration and ready for freedom, this book is your prophetic lifeline.

30 Days to Overcome Spiritual Blockages is a powerful, step-by-step journey designed to help you identify, confront, and dismantle the spiritual resistance holding you back. Whether you’re battling delay, confusion, spiritual heaviness, or a sense of unexplainable oppression, this 30-day guide gives you the tools to break through and flow again.

You’ll uncover:

✅ Hidden emotional wounds acting as spiritual entry points
✅ Demonic checkpoints stationed at your breakthrough moments
✅ Cursed objects, soul ties, and atmospheres blocking your peace
✅ How to use oil, fasting, prophetic actions, and strategic declarations
✅ Daily rituals to restore divine momentum, clarity, and alignment

Each day includes prophetic teaching, journaling prompts, real testimonies, targeted declarations, and warfare prayer points that will help you regain spiritual control and release divine flow.

This book is for you if:

  • You feel spiritually stuck, heavy, or delayed

  • You’ve experienced sudden losses, rejection, or repeated near-misses

  • You battle confusion, anxiety, or constant spiritual fatigue

  • You want to restore consistent peace, direction, and supernatural favor

  • You’re ready to step into a life of power, progress, and prophetic flow

You don’t have to keep fighting blind.
You don’t have to keep wondering why nothing’s moving.

The peace, clarity, and breakthrough you’ve been praying for is just 30 days away.
Are you ready to embrace it?

title: Planted to Flourish: The Power of Being Rooted in God’s House
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Planted to Flourish: The Power of Being Rooted in God’s House

What if you could live a life that feels anchored, secure, and overflowing with purpose? What if you could experience real belonging, deep growth, and unshakable peace?

You can.

Planted to Flourish is your invitation to discover the joy and strength that comes from being truly rooted in God’s house. This isn’t just about attending church—it’s about finding your spiritual family, growing deep roots of faith, and living the abundant life God designed for you.

Inside these pages, you’ll uncover:

  • The beauty and power of spiritual commitment.

  • How to cultivate unbreakable unity and authentic community.

  • Practical steps to heal from past hurts and embrace lasting connection.

  • Inspiring prayers and prophetic declarations to seal your covenant with God.

  • A clear path to receive Divine Direction, Divine Connection, Divine Provision, and Divine Protection.

This book is for you if you:

  • Long to find your place and purpose in God’s family.

  • Want to deepen your faith and bear lasting fruit.

  • Desire strong, healthy relationships built on love and trust.

  • Feel called to strengthen your church and transform your community.

  • Dream of leaving a spiritual legacy that impacts generations.

Planted to Flourish offers you more than insight—it offers you transformation. It’s a guide to stepping into the life God has promised: a life of stability, fruitfulness, and profound joy.

You were created to be planted. You were destined to flourish.

Your journey to a deeply rooted, thriving life begins here. Are you ready to embrace it?

title: How to Build a Powerful Home Altar That Speaks, Protects & Releases Heaven’s Power in Your Daily Life
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
You were never meant to live in a powerless house.

In the battles of life—whether they show up as delays, strange sicknesses, rebellious children, financial limitation, or spiritual confusion—God never intended for you to fight empty-handed. He designed a system, both ancient and prophetic, where Heaven responds to earth through the power of an altar.

The home altar is not just a piece of furniture or a sacred corner—it’s a spiritual technology. A divine access point. A place where your sacrifices speak louder than your enemies’ accusations. A prophetic gate where heaven meets your household and where fire is kindled daily to protect, direct, and empower you.

In church, there is a central altar where corporate power is released. But what happens when the warfare follows you home? When you feel spiritually attacked in the night? When your children are under siege? When something unseen is choking your progress—yet you’ve been praying, fasting, tithing, and nothing seems to shift?

That’s where the home altar comes in.

This book is a 28-chapter prophetic and practical journey to teach you:

  • How to build, dedicate, and protect your personal home altar

  • How to connect your home altar to your church altar for multiplied effect

  • How to activate divine protocols using oil, water, communion, prayer, and sacrifice

  • How to guard your altar from defilement and strange fire

  • How to release prophetic fire that speaks louder than any curse, witchcraft, or legal accusation

  • How to raise family altars that cover your children, restore marriages, and secure legacy

  • And ultimately, how to become a walking altar yourself—carrying divine presence and power wherever you go

This is not just about setting up a sacred place—it’s about unlocking divine patterns and supernatural systems that govern victories, covenant, restoration, and legacy.

Throughout these 28 chapters, you’ll also discover:

✅ Hidden biblical secrets from Abraham, Elijah, David, and Jesus
✅ Real-life testimonies of breakthrough and deliverance from believers around the world
✅ Prophetic activations to anoint your home, break generational cycles, and recover stolen blessings
✅ Step-by-step guides for cleansing, rededication, and aligning your altar with God’s timing

Who Is This Book For?

This book is for the spiritual warrior who is tired of recycled battles.
It’s for the prayerful mother who wants to secure her children’s destiny.
It’s for the business owner who senses invisible resistance.
It’s for the prophetic intercessor, the pastor, the home leader, the frustrated believer who feels like something spiritual is “off”—and is finally ready to fix it.

A Word from the Author

For over two decades, I’ve seen firsthand how altars rule outcomes.
Some people’s lives are blocked because of evil altars in their bloodline. Others struggle because their altar at home is silent, defiled, or never existed. But when the right altar is raised and honored properly—miracles happen. I’ve seen barrenness end, marriages restored, finances explode, curses reversed, and demons silenced.

In How to Build a Powerful Home Altar, I’ll walk you step-by-step through this sacred yet practical process. Whether you’re new to this or deeply seasoned, this book will equip you to experience God’s presence, power, and prophetic guidance like never before.

Are you ready to build an altar that speaks louder than any attack?

Then let’s begin.

—
Dr. Climate Wiseman

title: 30 Days to Dismantle Evil Altars: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Tear Down Spiritual Structures Fighting Your Life
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are you tired of feeling stuck, overwhelmed, and weighed down by invisible forces you can’t control?

You’ve tried everything, but the stress, fear, and confusion still linger. The battles in your life seem unending, and no matter how hard you fight, victory feels out of reach. If this sounds familiar, it’s time for a radical transformation.

This book is not just a guide—it’s your pathway to freedom. It’s designed to help you identify, dismantle, and removethe spiritual strongholds that have been blocking your peace, success, and joy. Through 30 powerful days, you’ll take practical, actionable steps that will not only free your spirit but also bring lasting emotional healing and inner peace.

Inside this book, you’ll discover:

  • How to recognize the hidden altars and negative spiritual structures that have been controlling your life.

  • Step-by-step guidance on how to tear them downand replace them with altars of freedom, worship, and divine authority.

  • Emotional healing strategies that will restore your peace, clarity, and joy.

  • Proven methods to walk in spiritual authority, and maintain your breakthrough, so the enemy can’t regain a foothold in your life.

This book is for you if:

  • You feel like you’re trapped in cycles of stress, fear, or hopelessness.

  • You’ve been struggling to find lasting peace and clarity in your life.

  • You sense that something spiritual is blocking your success and happiness.

  • You’re ready to experience freedom and breakthrough in all areas of your life.

In just 30 days, you can tear down the spiritual wallsholding you back and step into the life you were meant to live. This book is written with understanding, compassion, and practical wisdom, guiding you step-by-step to total freedom.

The peace you’ve been longing for is just 30 days away—are you ready to embrace it?

Take the first step toward your breakthrough today.

title: 30 Days to Break the Curse of “Almost There”: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Stop Near-Success Syndrome and Cross Your Finish Line
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
You were so close… again. But somehow, it slipped away.
If your life has been a series of near-breakthroughs, unfinished dreams, and doors that open only to shut in your face, this book was written for you.

The curse of “almost there” is real—and it ends now.

Maybe you’ve worked hard, prayed harder, and still find yourself stuck in delay, sabotage, and spiritual resistance. You’ve watched others cross the finish line while you live in cycles of frustration, fear, and exhaustion.

But what if the problem isn’t your effort… it’s the invisible barriers blocking your breakthrough?

In 30 Days to Break the Curse of Almost There, international prophet and spiritual strategist Dr. Climate Wiseman guides you through a transformational journey that exposes hidden patterns of delay and empowers you to finish what you start—once and for all.

This isn’t just a book—it’s a step-by-step prophetic process that will reset your mind, restore your momentum, and reignite your identity as a finisher.

Inside you’ll discover how to:

  • Break spiritual cycles of delay, disappointment, and distraction

  • Recognize emotional and environmental “almost there” triggers

  • Build finisher habits that lead to peace, progress, and purpose

  • Declare your breakthrough in advance—and watch it manifest

  • Seal your victory with prophetic prayer, action steps, and real-life application

This book is for you if:

  • You always get close to success but never fully arrive

  • You start things with excitement but struggle to finish

  • You’re tired of doors opening—and closing—too soon

  • You’ve been through delays that drained your faith

  • You’re ready to break free and walk in the life God designed for you

Written with power, compassion, and over 25 years of experience in helping thousands experience lasting breakthrough, Dr. Climate Wiseman gives you the tools to rewrite your story—one day at a time.

You don’t have to live in the land of almost.
You were born to finish.
The peace, power, and purpose you’ve been longing for is just 30 days away.

Are you ready to cross your finish line?

title: Multiply the Vision: A Practical Guide to Equipping Leaders Who Make Disciples
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are you ready to move beyond maintenance into true multiplication?

The Kingdom Temple isn’t called to be just another gathering place.
It is a spiritual stronghold where captives are set free and disciples are planted to flourish.

But this vision can’t be fulfilled by passive spectators or reluctant helpers.
It demands committed, equipped, and on-fire leaders who know how to reproduce themselves over and over.

This manual is your blueprint for that kind of leadership.
It will challenge you, train you, and transform you—moving you from simply serving to truly multiplying.

Inside you’ll discover:

  • How to conquer fear, laziness, offense, and hidden sin

  • How to invite, disciple, and train others to lead

  • How to build accountability, sustain personal revival, and prioritize God’s mission

  • How to create a culture of discipleship that reproduces for generations

If you’re tired of watching church growth stall at programs and events…
If you’re burdened to see real lives changed, families restored, and your city impacted…
If you’re willing to pay the price to become the kind of leader God can trust with souls…

This book is your call to arms.

It’s time to take ownership.
It’s time to make disciples who make disciples.
It’s time to see The Kingdom Temple become everything God intended:
A place where the captives are set free, and all disciples are planted to flourish.

Answer the call. Multiply the mission. Change the world.

title: Covenant Wealth: Unlocking God’s Divine Economy through Tithes, Offerings & First Fruits
author: Dr C Wiseman
description:
Are you tired of giving… but still struggling?
You tithe. You sow. You pray. Yet breakthrough seems delayed, and your finances feel stuck in a cycle of lack, fear, and frustration.

You are not alone.
Many believers live under open heavens but still experience closed doors—because they don’t understand God’s covenant economy.

If you’ve ever wondered:

  • “Why am I still broke when I’m faithful?”

  • “Where is the harvest from my giving?”

  • “Is there something I’m missing?”

This book is your answer.

In Covenant Wealth, Master Prophet Dr. Climate Wiseman shares the prophetic revelation, personal testimonies, and biblical blueprint that took him from homelessness and a 25p tithe… to global abundance and supernatural provision.

This is more than a book—it’s a divine reset for your finances.
You’ll discover:

✅ What the tithe really is—and how to activate its protection and provision
✅ Why offerings must speak—and how to sow for maximum return
✅ The power of First Fruits—and how one act of obedience can change your entire year
✅ How to avoid financial delay by breaking common giving mistakes
✅ How to live in the covenant cycle of Tithe → Offering → First Fruit → Harvest → Repeat

This book is for you if:

  • You tithe, but still live paycheck to paycheck

  • You want to sow prophetically, but don’t know how

  • You desire financial breakthrough without compromising your faith

  • You are a pastor, leader, or giver ready to teach or live the truth boldly

  • You’ve been stuck in cycles of struggle and want to unlock lasting overflow

You were never created to live in survival. You were born for covenant wealth.
It’s time to align your giving with God’s divine economy—and watch the heavens open over your life.

📖 Your breakthrough is not delayed—your understanding is about to catch up.

The blessing you’ve been longing for is one covenant decision away. Are you ready to walk in it?
